pullrequest.title: Pose frame semantics: Suggested semantics to handle maximal coordinates

content.raw: As I look through this document again, I think some of your changes break the flow by referencing some things before they have been defined. I'll make some specific suggestions where I think this could be improved.
content.html: As I look through this document again, I think some of your changes break the flow by referencing some things before they have been defined. I'll make some specific suggestions where I think this could be improved.
